item.title: 策略师称亚洲外汇市场将最受益于特朗普对美元的影响
item.description: 唐纳德·特朗普总统表示不认为美元贬值过度，此番言论加速了关于可能采取协同行动使全球储备货币贬值的讨论。【原文：President Donald Trump’s comments that he didn’t think the dollar had weakened excessively have accelerated a debate about a possible concerted move to depreciate the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: 美元在美联储会议前下跌，股市黄金上涨：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股指期货随美股同步上涨，强劲的企业盈利提振了市场情绪；与此同时，在美联储1月政策会议前夕，美元延续跌势。【原文：Asian equity-index futures rose alongside US stocks as robust corporate earnings firmed sentiment, while the dollar extended its slump ahead of the Federal Reserve’s January policy meeting.】

item.title: 英国承诺全民人工智能培训以把握1930亿美元机遇
item.description: 英国科技大臣利兹·肯德尔承诺为所有英国工人提供人工智能培训，政府正积极拥抱这项被认为每年可推动经济产出增长1400亿英镑（1930亿美元）的技术。【原文：Technology Secretary Liz Kendall promised to offer training in artificial intelligence for all UK workers as the government seeks to embrace a technology that it said has the potential to boost economic output by £140 billion ($193 billion) a year.】

item.title: 股市飙升推高养老金，但私募市场风险上升
item.description: 标普全球公司表示，若本财年前六个月的投资收益能在未来六个月持续，美国公共养老金或能支付近90%的承诺福利，但风险也在攀升。【原文：US public pensions could pay almost 90% of promised benefits if investment gains made in the first half of the fiscal year persist over the next six months, but risks are also climbing, according to S&P Global Inc.】

item.title: 据称，标准航空的投资者正寻求通过出售股份筹集16亿美元资金。
item.description: 据知情人士透露，标准航空公司（StandardAero Inc.）的两名最大股东正计划通过发行这家飞机维修服务提供商的股票，筹集高达16亿美元的资金。【原文：A pair of StandardAero Inc.’s largest shareholders are seeking to raise as much as $1.6 billion in an offering of the aircraft maintenance services provider’s shares, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南银行因债务担保激增而暗藏风险
item.description: 越南贷款机构正提供更多担保以覆盖借款人偿债不足的情况，这促使部分评级机构警告称，这个全球增长最快的经济体之一存在隐性风险。【原文：Vietnamese lenders are providing more pledges to cover borrowers if they fall short paying back debt, prompting some rating firms to warn of hidden risks in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.】

item.title: Pop Mart早期投资者押注中国价格战将持续
item.description: 据一位投资中国最成功消费品牌的风险投资人士称，中国消费领域持续的降价竞争很可能还将持续，因为需求疲软和本土企业效率提升不断推动成本下降。【原文：The price war engulfing China’s consumer sector is likely to persist, as sluggish demand and rising efficiency at local firms keep driving costs lower, according to a venture capital investor backing some of China’s most successful consumer brands.】

item.title: 债券交易员瞄准鸽派美联储人选，里德尔势头渐起
item.description: 随着贝莱德公司首席投资官里克·里德尔接替杰罗姆·鲍威尔的呼声日益高涨，债券期货交易员正加码押注美联储将转向鸽派政策。【原文：Bond futures traders are ramping up bets on a dovish policy shift at the Federal Reserve as BlackRock Inc.’s chief investment officer Rick Rieder is gaining momentum to succeed Jerome Powell.】

item.title: BMO资本市场聘请富国银行的马利克担任运营主管
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场部门任命阿曼·马利克为首席运营官，接替妮娜·克内泽维奇，这是该行最新一轮领导层调整。【原文：Bank of Montreal’s capital markets arm has named Aman Malik as chief operating officer, replacing Nina Knezevic in the latest leadership shuffle at the firm.】

item.title: 欧元兑美元汇率突破1.20美元关口，因美元普遍走软及特朗普言论
item.description: 在特朗普总统表示不担心美元贬值后，欧元兑美元汇率首次突破1.20关口，创下2021年6月以来新高。【原文：The euro climbed above the 1.20 level against the dollar for the first time since June 2021 after President Donald Trump said he was not concerned with the US currency’s decline.】

item.title: 德州仪器芯片订单回升，前景稳健
item.description: 德州仪器公司作为全球最大的模拟芯片制造商，对当前财季给出了强劲的营收预期，表明工业设备和汽车的需求正开始回升。【原文：Texas Instruments Inc., the biggest maker of analog chips, gave a strong revenue forecast for the current period, indicating that demand for industrial equipment and vehicles is beginning to rebound.】

item.title: 报告称稳定币对银行存款构成5000亿美元风险
item.description: 渣打银行指出，随着稳定币日益普及，美国银行面临存款被转移至数字资产领域的风险。【原文：As stablecoins gain traction, US banks are at risk of their deposits being siphoned over to the digital asset realm, according to Standard Chartered Bank.】

item.title: 三星、SK海力士财报将展现AI内存之争
item.description: 在三星电子与SK海力士交织的漫长历史中，两家公司罕见地选择同日公布财报，这标志着双方在人工智能存储芯片领域的高风险竞争再掀新战役。【原文：In a rare occurrence in their long and intertwined histories, Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Inc. are set to report earnings on the same day, the latest salvo in their high-stakes race in AI memory chips.】

item.title: 特朗普称对美元贬值不担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普表示，他不认为美元价值下跌过多，称美元表现"非常出色"，并预期货币价值会出现波动。【原文：President Donald Trump said he did not think the value of the US dollar had declined too much, saying it was “doing great” and he expected currency values to fluctuate.】

item.title: 美韩贸易争端源于科技规则与僵局
item.description: 据美国官员透露，特朗普政府正要求韩国采取具体措施落实其与美国签署的六个月前达成的贸易协议，以避免关税升至25%。【原文：The Trump administration is demanding that South Korea take concrete steps to implement its six-month-old trade deal with the US in order to prevent tariffs from rising to 25%, according to US officials.】

item.title: 消费者信心骤降重燃国债收益率上升趋势
item.description: 短期国债因消费者信心下滑而上涨，重启了去年一度停滞的收益率曲线陡峭化趋势。【原文：A rally in short-maturity Treasuries sparked by slumping consumer confidence re-started last year’s yield-curve steepening trend that had run aground this month.】

item.title: 日本债券崩盘如何令全球市场如坐针毡
item.description:
在今天的《亚洲大视野》播客中，我们将探讨日本债券市场暴跌如何引发全球市场震荡，以及未来可能的发展态势。

【原文：

On today’s Big Take Asia podcast, how a crash in Japan’s bond market sent shockwaves through global markets and what to expect next.

】

item.title: 墨西哥央行暗示二月暂停加息，后续宽松步伐将放缓
item.description: 墨西哥央行暗示，将在2月份的首次货币政策会议上暂停降息周期，随后以更渐进的步伐重启宽松政策。【原文：Mexico’s central bank signaled it will likely pause its cycle of interest-rate cuts at its first monetary policy meeting of the year in February, then resume easing at a more gradual pace.】

item.title: SpaceX获得联邦互联网补贴后，现要求修改规则
item.description: 由埃隆·马斯克创立的卫星公司SpaceX正向州监管机构寻求多项让步，这些让步与一项耗资425亿美元的政府计划有关，该计划旨在为美国偏远地区提供互联网接入服务。【原文：SpaceX, the satellite company founded by Elon Musk, is asking state regulators for a number of concessions related to a $42.5 billion government program to provide Internet access to remote parts of the country.】

item.title: 城堡投资加入金属交易热潮，金属价格飙升至历史新高
item.description: 城堡基金——大宗商品市场最成功的对冲基金——终于进军工业金属领域。随着铜、锡等金属价格屡创新高，该基金在多年回避该领域后改变了立场。【原文：Citadel, the most successful hedge fund in commodity markets, is finally taking a step into industrial metals — shifting its stance after years of avoiding the sector as prices from copper to tin hit record highs.】

item.title: 纽约电力价格飙升，更严寒天气即将来袭
item.description: 席卷美国主要城市的破纪录寒潮预计将在本周末加剧，并推动本已飙升的电价再创新高，因电力系统正竭力应对前所未有的用电需求。【原文：The record-setting cold gripping major US cities is expected to intensify this weekend and push already-soaring power prices to new heights as electricity grids struggle to cope with unprecedented demand.】

item.title: 加拿大央行料将维持利率不变，因贸易紧张局势持续
item.description: 加拿大央行周三很可能维持利率不变，因官员们正等待更明确的信号，以判断经济还能承受多少来自美国贸易政策冲击的损害。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday as officials wait for clearer signals on how much damage the economy may yet absorb from shocks in US trade policy.】

item.title: 花旗预计日元将进一步走强，取决于资金是否回流日本债券市场
item.description: 日元自2024年8月以来最强劲的三日涨势，尚不足以让花旗集团策略师丹尼尔·托邦转为看涨日元。他表示，要延续涨势，日本买家需要重新将资金回流至本国债券市场。【原文：The yen’s strongest three-day rally since August 2024 isn’t enough to turn Citigroup Inc. strategist Daniel Tobon into a yen bull just yet. To keep the gains going, he said, Japanese buyers will need to start shifting cash back to the nation’s bond market again.】

item.title: 贝莱德裁撤HPS交易前聘用的私募信贷高管
item.description: 贝莱德公司正从其私募融资解决方案部门裁减约10名员工，该公司正持续推进对HPS投资伙伴公司120亿美元收购案的整合工作。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is cutting about 10 people from its private financing solutions group as it continues to integrate its $12 billion acquisition of HPS Investment Partners.】

item.title: 南非续签政府与企业合作协议以促进经济增长
item.description: 南非政府与商界领袖正重启合作关系，以新的举措推动经济复苏——该国经济已持续十余年表现低迷。【原文：South Africa’s government and business leaders are rebooting their partnership with a renewed push to revive an economy that has underperformed for more than a decade.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁失去威力
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自我们专家嘉宾及信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: OpenAI推出新工具助力科学家推进人工智能探索
item.description: OpenAI正推出一款免费工具，旨在帮助科学家更便捷地使用ChatGPT起草研究论文并与同事协作。此举是该公司将聊天机器人定位为科研工作与发现助手的整体战略的一部分。【原文：OpenAI is releasing a free tool aimed at making it easier for scientists to use ChatGPT to draft research papers and collaborate with colleagues, part of a larger effort to position its chatbot as an aide for scientific work and discoveries.】

item.title: 跨大西洋柴油价差飙升，冬季风暴扰乱美国供应
item.description: 美国柴油期货价格正大幅上涨，涨幅超过欧洲基准合约。一场冬季风暴过后，持续的严寒天气正给该国燃料市场带来巨大压力。【原文：US diesel futures are surging ahead of benchmark European contracts as a winter storm, followed by continued frigid temperatures, piles pressure on the country’s fuel market.】

item.title: Pinterest在推进人工智能战略之际将裁员"不足15%"
item.description: Pinterest公司表示，计划裁减"少于15%"的员工并缩减办公空间，以将资源转向人工智能领域的投资。【原文：Pinterest Inc. said it plans to cut “less than 15%” of its workforce and reduce office space as it shifts resources toward investing in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚政府增持美元储备，对比索构成压力
item.description: 哥伦比亚财政部自上周五起在即期市场加大美元购买力度，此前该国比索汇率触及近五年来的最高水平。【原文：Colombia’s finance ministry has stepped up dollar purchases in the spot market since Friday, after the peso hit is strongest level in almost five years.】
